title: Buongiorno Italia! [kit]
creator_credit: BBC, Maddalena Fagandini and Alan Wilding
brief_description: A kit for the Italian for beginners’ course, “Buongiorno Italia!”, containing three 60 minute audio cassettes for pronunciation practice, a copy of “Teachers’ Notes” and a copy of the student text for the course. See also the double video sets, “Buongiorno Italia!” programs 1-10 and 11-20.
